title: Rescue the gnome
content:
uickly after the goblins leave, they'll notice the windmill stop spinning, so give it a bit of time before you hit the lever. Alternatively, if you press the 'Release Brake' Lever, the gnome will be lost.

Head back out to the windmill fan to let the gnome down. He's irritable, but you'll learn his name is Barcus Wroot. If you ask him what happened he'll show you an amulet and be on his way. Since you saved Barcus, you will later meet him again at the Grymforge, in the quest Save the Grymforge G
